translator_notes: 脂評 (Zhiping) refers to the commentary tradition attributed to Zhiyan Zhai (脂硯齋) and other early commentators who had intimate knowledge of Cao Xueqin and the manuscript
匯校本 (huixiaoben) indicates this is a collated edition that synthesizes multiple manuscript sources, including 甲戌本, 庚辰本, 己卯本, and 蒙府本
Zhiyan Zhai's identity remains debated - possibilities include Cao Xueqin's friend, relative, or even the author himself under a pseudonym
The Zhiping commentaries are invaluable for understanding hidden meanings, foreshadowing, and authorial intent
research_notes: Consulted scholarly literature on Zhiping commentary traditions
Referenced Zhou Ruchang's research on manuscript sources
Reviewed standard translations of the title in English (Hawkes: 'The Story of the Stone', Yang: 'A Dream of Red Mansions')
Checked Russian translation conventions (В. А. Панасюк uses 'Сон в красном тереме')
Verified Japanese rendering of title (standard: 紅楼夢)
